Words not in official answer list



Number of Pangrams: 1

Maximum Puzzle Score: 183

Number of Answers: 48

Points Needed for Genius: 128

Genius requires between 20 and 42 words. You need at least a 7-letter word to reach genius. If you don't get the pangram, you need 76% of the total points to reach genius. If you get the pangram, you only need 67% of the remaining points to reach genius.

Other days with this pangram:

  • November 27, 2019 (Center Letter: U)
  • May 3, 2019 (Center Letter: R)
  • August 24, 2018 (Center Letter: O)



    • How does this puzzle compare to other puzzles?

    Today's score of 183 was the in the 73rd percentile of all puzzles.
    The last time there was a score this high was on April 4, 2020.
    The highest score ever was 444 on April 6, 2019.
    The lowest score ever was 50 on May 17, 2019.

    This puzzle's 48 possible answers rank it in the 81st percentile of all puzzles.
    The last time there were more answers than this was on April 4, 2020.
    The highest number of answers was 81 on June 8, 2019.
    The lowest number of answers was 21 on August 5, 2018.

    It takes a 7-letter word for genius. This is pretty common.
